body:
If you have a 3x3 or 2x2 Rubik's Cube, tell me your time using this:
http://www.cubetimer.com/
My 2x2 time is 10.94  seconds
My 3x3 time is really bad because I have a 9 year old Rubik's 3x3. ._. I'm not telling you my time xD

EDIT: For all you people wanting to solve a Rubik's Cube, go to this website!!!
http://www.youcandothecube.com/secret-unlocked/solution-stage-one.aspx
It really helped me as a beginner! Go through all the steps carefully and follow directions, you'll get it in no time!

replies.body: Yes finally a post. 3x3 is 1 min and  59 seconds (record) and I have the dayan zhanchi speed cube :D ! Sticker less... My brother can solve it in 29 seconds and my friend in 17 seconds! Currently learning Fredrick's method. Haven't got to any other cubes even though my brother has speed cubes of all the kinds!

Takes some serious skill.
